name: Wheelie Madness 3d
description:
Realistic wheelie game.
Ride motocross bikes and other cool bikes(2 stroke & 4 stroke).
Play online with friends! (1-4 players)

Experience the thrill of formula drift in our latest motorsport racing game! Wheelie Madness 3D Drift Racing will test your skill to the limit. How far can you perform wheelie and stunts with your motorcycle? Can you impress everyone as you rampage through the city, desert, or on off road tracks? Play our motorsport game and find out!
